page.title: 07CARLETT PARK COLLEGE contd.
page.content: the main block. The other parts of the college are heated by oil. Eventually they are all going to be heated by gas. The courses in the evening are disco dancing,yoga and basket making.They are the{recreation} courses.The vocational courses are typing and engineering. There are many sporting activities which include cricket,football and volleyball. You have to be 16 before you can come to the college.Students from all over the world come to the college.Altogether there are 7,500 students in the college. In the year 2000 the college will have leisure domes and new technology courses.They will also people how to use computers.
